summary: A test suite that validates the TensorFlow implementation of the ESM model, checking its configuration, forward passes for masked language modeling and token classification, model construction, decoder functionality, common attribute consistency, loading from pretrained checkpoints, resizing of token embeddings, and correct saving/loading after resizing.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the TensorFlow ESM model for production use, enabling reliable NLP applications and simplifying maintenance and deployment.
